alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Knox; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 8:21PM CST until February 26 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN FOARD...EASTERN KNOX...SOUTHWESTERN WILBARGER AND WESTERN BAYLOR COUNTIES... At 820 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Lockett to 8 miles north of Red Springs to near Goree, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 810 PM, a weather station near Knox City reported 58 mph winds. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Seymour, Munday, Goree, Red Springs, Lake Kemp, Vera, Grayback, Rhineland and Bomarton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
